translations: v.用笞杖（或荆条等）打（cane 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: In 1994, Michael Fay, an 18-year-old teenager living in Singapore with his father, was sentenced to caning for theft and vandalism.
sentences.translation: 1994年，Michael Fay，一位和他的父亲住在新加坡的18岁青少年，因为偷窃和故意破坏公物而被判鞭刑。

sentences.sentence: Whether tried according to the law of the state or the Party discipline, he cannot escape the caning he deserves.
sentences.translation: 无论是按国法，还是按党纪，他都逃不了挨板子。

sentences.sentence: Caning is one of the cruel tortures.
